title: We Draw Names for Our “Blue Christmas” + Eddie Shaves his Eyebrow and Holds A Sign on the Side of the Road + Nurse Bobo On Holiday Diet Myths
itunes:title: We Draw Names for Our “Blue Christmas” + Eddie Shaves his Eyebrow and Holds A Sign on the Side of the Road + Nurse Bobo On Holiday Diet Myths
description:
We are having a “Blue Christmas” holiday exchange where we have to give gifts that are the color blue. Today we drew for names to find out who we have to buy for. Eddie pays up on his debt for losing the field goal challenge. We shave 3 lines into his eye brown and make him hold a sign on a busy street. We talk to Nurse Bobo about Diet Myths!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
